changeSet.author: anastasia.yurkova2003@gmail.com
changeSet.sql:
WITH series AS ( SELECT generate_series(1, 100) AS sery )
INSERT INTO users ("name", surname, "age", gender, username, "password", inserted_date_at_utc) SELECT CASE WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 then 'Vlad' WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 then 'Nastya' WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 then 'Katya' WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 then 'Polina' WHEN s.sery = 1 then 'Yarick' ELSE 'Andrew' END, CASE WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 then 'Kolyago' WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 then 'Yurkova' WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 then 'Kamenko' WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 then 'Starostenko' WHEN s.sery = 1 then 'Vasilevski' ELSE 'Yuriev' END, CASE WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 then 20 WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 then 18 WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 then 13 WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 then 17 WHEN s.sery = 1 then 25 ELSE 31 END, CASE WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 then 'FEMALE'::gender_enum ELSE 'MALE'::gender_enum END, 'User' || s.sery, lpad(s.sery::varchar, 6, '0'), now() FROM series s
